common.title: Floorp 浏览器
common.description: Floorp 是一款来自日本，基于 Firefox 的新浏览器，具有极佳的私密性和灵活性。

downloadPage.downloadAlert: 在下载 Floorp 之前，你需要同意 <1>隐私政策</1>。

daylight.label: 下载 Florp Daylight
daylight.description: Floorp Daylight 是 Floorp 的测试版，它可能无法正常工作。
daylight.alert: 您确定要下载 Floorp Daylight？它可能无法正常工作。

privacy.description: Floorp 默认内置一个强大的跟踪拦截器，保护用户免受潜伏在网络上的各种恶意跟踪器的跟踪。同时，它还提供指纹识别保护。

flexible.title: 灵活布局
flexible.description: Floorp's layout customization is unlimited. Move the tab bar to the bottom of the window, hide the title bar, and more. Create your own Floorp.

switchable.title: Customizable Design
switchable.description: In addition to the usual Firefox theme customization, Floorp allows you to switch between five different interface designs, including OS-specific themes.

sidebar.title: Regular Updates
sidebar.description: Floorp is based on Firefox ESR. Floorp will be updated every 4 weeks, with security updates provided before each Firefox release.

noTracking.title: 无用户跟踪
noTracking.description: 我们不会收集用户的个人信息。我们不跟踪用户数据，也不出售用户数据。我们与任何广告公司均无隶属关系。

openSource.title: Powered by Open Source
openSource.description: Floorp's source code is entirely open, allowing anyone to view it and contribute to the project. Not only is the browser itself open source, but the build environment is as well.

dualSidebar.title: Dual Sidebar
dualSidebar.description:
您是否满足于只有一个侧边栏？想要在侧边栏打开你的网站？Floorp 内置的侧边栏可以显示网页和浏览器管理工具，为你带来舒适的浏览体验。
为你重新设计的侧边栏！可以从书签、历史记录查看你想要查看的内容！

flexibleToolbar.title: 灵活的工具栏和选项卡栏
flexibleToolbar.description: Organize your web browsing with Tree Style Tabs! Use them as a vertical tabs, or combine them both for ultimate flexibility. Customize your bookmarks bar and more to create the perfect browsing experience. Floorp empowers everyone to personalize their browser, from beginners to CSS experts. Choose from a variety of themes or craft your own with custom CSS!

privacyProtection.title: Caring about the User and the Web
privacyProtection.description:
Floorp 不跟踪用户，只阻止网站的恶意跟踪。Floorp 是网站和用户之间的坚强壁垒。
人人都希望保护自己的隐私，所以 Floorp 只拦截通过大数据定向投放广告为生的网站跟踪器，为什么不使用 Floorp 来保护你的隐私呢？

landingPage.downloadFloorp: 下载最新的 Floorp 浏览器
